LanguageData.ShortCircuitPartial: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but {2} of it was mitigated by the fuses.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitProtected: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but any serious damage was prevented by the fuses.
LanguageData.FlareProtected:
A solar flare has begun.

Your magnetic shield should protect any electric devices from the intense radiation, but radio communications will be near impossible.

It should pass in about a day.
